trans-unit.source: Rent Orders

seg-source.mrk: Rent Orders

trans-unit.source: In the Rent Order page, enter the subject to be rented, the period of renting and invoicing, and the price for the rate period. In addition to the Rate Code, the Rental Start Date, Rental End Date (optional), Rate Unit Price, and Invoicing Period can be entered. The appropriate current period for invoicing is retrieved from the information entered in the Invoice Period, Month Based, and Prepaid fields. The price for this period depends on its length and the price for the rate period.

seg-source.mrk: In the Rent Order page, enter the subject to be rented, the period of renting and invoicing, and the price for the rate period.
In addition to the Rate Code, the Rental Start Date, Rental End Date (optional), Rate Unit Price, and Invoicing Period can be entered.
The appropriate current period for invoicing is retrieved from the information entered in the Invoice Period, Month Based, and Prepaid fields.
The price for this period depends on its length and the price for the rate period.

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane, click cc|rental > Contract Management > Rent Orders to view existing or create new Rent Orders.

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, click cc|rental > Contract Management > Rent Orders to view existing or create new Rent Orders.

trans-unit.source: : <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2018-08-24T11:09:39.0071437-05:00" MadCap:creator="NTadajewski0100" MadCap:initials="NT" MadCap:comment="Again - what is this Email Contract action? (Possibly) doesn't appear in the 2017 SP2 product config" MadCap:editor="NTadajewski0100" MadCap:editDate="2018-08-24T11:09:39.8119415-05:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Rent Order page </MadCap:annotation>

seg-source.mrk: : <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2018-08-24T11:09:39.0071437-05:00" MadCap:creator="NTadajewski0100" MadCap:initials="NT" MadCap:comment="Again - what is this Email Contract action? (Possibly) doesn't appear in the 2017 SP2 product config" MadCap:editor="NTadajewski0100" MadCap:editDate="2018-08-24T11:09:39.8119415-05:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Rent Order page </MadCap:annotation>

trans-unit.source: This page contains the same fields as the sales order, plus the rental-specific fields, which are described with other relevant fields in the following sections.

seg-source.mrk: This page contains the same fields as the sales order, plus the rental-specific fields, which are described with other relevant fields in the following sections.

trans-unit.source: Lines FastTab

seg-source.mrk: Lines FastTab

trans-unit.source: The fields on the Lines FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on the Lines FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Field

seg-source.mrk: Field

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Rental Position

seg-source.mrk: Rental Position

trans-unit.source: Identifies if the line is a Sales or Rental item or a Rate Component. The Sales option is the default, but it automatically changes to Rental when a rental item is entered.

seg-source.mrk: Identifies if the line is a Sales or Rental item or a Rate Component.
The Sales option is the default, but it automatically changes to Rental when a rental item is entered.

trans-unit.source: While it is unnecessary to select a value in this field when entering lines, it can be useful to change it to Rental so that the Item No. list is filtered by rent items.

seg-source.mrk: While it is unnecessary to select a value in this field when entering lines, it can be useful to change it to Rental so that the Item No.
list is filtered by rent items.

trans-unit.source: When the line is to be used as a Rate Component, then this field must be set to Rate Part or One-Time Invoicing. A Rate Component can be manually entered below a Rental position and will be linked to that item line automatically.

seg-source.mrk: When the line is to be used as a Rate Component, then this field must be set to Rate Part or One-Time Invoicing.
A Rate Component can be manually entered below a Rental position and will be linked to that item line automatically.

trans-unit.source: Type

seg-source.mrk: Type

trans-unit.source: Identifies what is being rented or sold. The options are G/L Account, Item and Resource.

seg-source.mrk: Identifies what is being rented or sold.
The options are G/L Account, Item and Resource.

trans-unit.source: No.

seg-source.mrk: No.

trans-unit.source: Number of the G/L Account, Item or Resource.

seg-source.mrk: Number of the G/L Account, Item or Resource.

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: This field also contains an AssistEdit button that opens the Disposition Calendar (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Disposition Calendar.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Disposition Calendar” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: This field also contains an AssistEdit button that opens the Disposition Calendar (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Disposition Calendar.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Disposition Calendar” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Rate Component No.

seg-source.mrk: Rate Component No.

trans-unit.source: Contains the number of the Rate Component if the Rental Position field is set to Rate Part or One-Time Invoicing. These lines are related to the item line above.

seg-source.mrk: Contains the number of the Rate Component if the Rental Position field is set to Rate Part or One-Time Invoicing.
These lines are related to the item line above.

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Description of the G/L Account, Item or Resource.

seg-source.mrk: Description of the G/L Account, Item or Resource.

trans-unit.source: Location Code

seg-source.mrk: Location Code

trans-unit.source: Defaults from the Location Code field on the Shipping FastTab. If a Rental Location Code is specified on the Rental FastTab on the Customer Card, it defaults to this field.

seg-source.mrk: Defaults from the Location Code field on the Shipping FastTab.
If a Rental Location Code is specified on the Rental FastTab on the Customer Card, it defaults to this field.

trans-unit.source: For Rental line types, this field must indicate the proper rental location to process the rent order.

seg-source.mrk: For Rental line types, this field must indicate the proper rental location to process the rent order.

trans-unit.source: Customer Location Code

seg-source.mrk: Customer Location Code

trans-unit.source: Defaults from the Customer Location Code field on the Customer Card. This field must be filled in to process the rent order.

seg-source.mrk: Defaults from the Customer Location Code field on the Customer Card.
This field must be filled in to process the rent order.

trans-unit.source: Quantity

seg-source.mrk: Quantity

trans-unit.source: Number of units to be rented or sold.

seg-source.mrk: Number of units to be rented or sold.

trans-unit.source: Unit of Measure Code

seg-source.mrk: Unit of Measure Code

trans-unit.source: Measurement of units to be rented or sold.

seg-source.mrk: Measurement of units to be rented or sold.

trans-unit.source: Rental Rate Code

seg-source.mrk: Rental Rate Code

trans-unit.source: Determines the Rate Unit Price on the rental line as set up in the Rent Prices or Line Discounts pages.

seg-source.mrk: Determines the Rate Unit Price on the rental line as set up in the Rent Prices or Line Discounts pages.

trans-unit.source: Invoice Period

seg-source.mrk: Invoice Period

trans-unit.source: Determines how the periods on the invoice are created. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Determines how the periods on the invoice are created.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: Month

seg-source.mrk: Month

trans-unit.source: Half Year

seg-source.mrk: Half Year

trans-unit.source: Two Months

seg-source.mrk: Two Months

trans-unit.source: Year

seg-source.mrk: Year

trans-unit.source: Quarters

seg-source.mrk: Quarters

trans-unit.source: None

seg-source.mrk: None

trans-unit.source: For more information, refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Invoicing.htm#_Ref236733261" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Invoicing Parameters” on page 1</MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: For more information, refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Invoicing.htm#_Ref236733261" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Invoicing Parameters” on page 1</MadCap:xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calendar Code

seg-source.mrk: Calendar Code

trans-unit.source: If populated, the system uses a Calendar Code for the invoicing of Rental periods.

seg-source.mrk: If populated, the system uses a Calendar Code for the invoicing of Rental periods.

trans-unit.source: For more information, refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Invoicing.htm#_Ref355093049" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Calendar Codes” on page 1</MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: For more information, refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Invoicing.htm#_Ref355093049" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Calendar Codes” on page 1</MadCap:xref>.

trans-unit.source: Month Based

seg-source.mrk: Month Based

trans-unit.source: If selected, invoices are geared toward the calendar month. For example, if the contract period is 05/15/2019 through 08/31/2019 and this check box is selected, the first invoice period will be from 05/15/2019 through 05/31/2019, and then the next period will be 06/01/2019 through 06/30/2019, and so on. The price on the first period will be prorated accordingly.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, invoices are geared toward the calendar month.

For example, if the contract period is 05/15/2019 through 08/31/2019 and this check box is selected, the first invoice period will be from 05/15/2019 through 05/31/2019, and then the next period will be 06/01/2019 through 06/30/2019, and so on.
The price on the first period will be prorated accordingly.

trans-unit.source: For more information, refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Invoicing.htm#_Ref237316924" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Invoice Periods and Month Based Date Calculations” on page 1</MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: For more information, refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Invoicing.htm#_Ref237316924" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Invoice Periods and Month Based Date Calculations” on page 1</MadCap:xref>.

trans-unit.source: Prepaid

seg-source.mrk: Prepaid

trans-unit.source: If selected, the line is processed by the date it is invoiced and the account to which it is posted.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, the line is processed by the date it is invoiced and the account to which it is posted.

trans-unit.source: For more information, refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Invoicing.htm#_Ref417370058" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Invoice Periods and Prepaid Date Calculations” on page 1</MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: For more information, refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Invoicing.htm#_Ref417370058" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Invoice Periods and Prepaid Date Calculations” on page 1</MadCap:xref>.

trans-unit.source: Rental Start Date

seg-source.mrk: Rental Start Date

trans-unit.source: Beginning of the rental contract period. This date is included in the item availability and is integral with the invoicing functionality (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Invoicing.htm#_Ref236733331" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Invoicing” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Beginning of the rental contract period.

This date is included in the item availability and is integral with the invoicing functionality (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Invoicing.htm#_Ref236733331" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Invoicing” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Rental End Date

seg-source.mrk: Rental End Date

trans-unit.source: End of the rental contract period; this date is optional.

seg-source.mrk: End of the rental contract period; this date is optional.

trans-unit.source: If left empty, the Total Price is calculated for one Rate Period on the document line and in page totals.

seg-source.mrk: If left empty, the Total Price is calculated for one Rate Period on the document line and in page totals.

trans-unit.source: Rental Return Date

seg-source.mrk: Rental Return Date

trans-unit.source: Used with the return of the rental item (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Returns.htm#_Ref355092985" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Returns” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Used with the return of the rental item (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Returns.htm#_Ref355092985" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Returns” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Next Invoice Period

seg-source.mrk: Next Invoice Period

trans-unit.source: Displays the next period to be invoiced after an invoice has been created. This field must be displayed using the “Choose Columns” function.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the next period to be invoiced after an invoice has been created.
This field must be displayed using the “Choose Columns” function.

trans-unit.source: Rate Unit Price

seg-source.mrk: Rate Unit Price

trans-unit.source: Price from the Rental Rate Code/Rent Price combination set up for the rental item.

seg-source.mrk: Price from the Rental Rate Code/Rent Price combination set up for the rental item.

trans-unit.source: Unit Price Total Rental Time

seg-source.mrk: Unit Price Total Rental Time

trans-unit.source: Total price for the complete rental duration:

seg-source.mrk: Total price for the complete rental duration:

trans-unit.source:
Number of Rate Periods resulting from the
Rental Start Date and Rental End Date fields * Rate Unit Price

seg-source.mrk: Number of Rate Periods resulting from the
Rental Start Date and Rental End Date fields * Rate Unit Price

trans-unit.source: For example:

seg-source.mrk: For example:

trans-unit.source: If Rental Rate Code = MONTH, Rental Period = 2/1/2019 – 2/28/2019, and Rate Unit Price = 300, then the Unit Price Total Rental Time = 300.

seg-source.mrk: If Rental Rate Code = MONTH, Rental Period = 2/1/2019 – 2/28/2019, and Rate Unit Price = 300, then the Unit Price Total Rental Time = 300.

trans-unit.source: If Rental Rate Code = DAY for the same period (28 days), and Rate Unit Price = 9.5, then Unit Price Total Rental Time = 266 (28 * 9.5).

seg-source.mrk: If Rental Rate Code = DAY for the same period (28 days), and Rate Unit Price = 9.5, then Unit Price Total Rental Time = 266 (28 * 9.5).

trans-unit.source: The total is also based on whether the Month Based check box is selected (refer to topic “Invoicing” on page 1).

seg-source.mrk: The total is also based on whether the Month Based check box is selected (refer to topic “Invoicing” on page 1).

trans-unit.source: Amount Total Rental Time

seg-source.mrk: Amount Total Rental Time

trans-unit.source: Total price based on the following calculation:

seg-source.mrk: Total price based on the following calculation:

trans-unit.source: Quantity * Unit Price Total Rental Time - Rental Line Discount Amount

seg-source.mrk: Quantity * Unit Price Total Rental Time - Rental Line Discount Amount

trans-unit.source: Return Qty. to Receive / Return Qty. Received

seg-source.mrk: Return Qty.
to Receive / Return Qty.
Received

trans-unit.source: Used with the return of the rental item (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Returns.htm#_Ref355092985" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Returns” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Used with the return of the rental item (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Returns.htm#_Ref355092985" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Returns” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Qty. Extensions

seg-source.mrk: Qty.
Extensions

trans-unit.source: Displays the number of extensions that have been processed for the order line (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Extensions.htm#_Ref237338128" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Extensions ” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Displays the number of extensions that have been processed for the order line (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Extensions.htm#_Ref237338128" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Extensions ” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Qty. Failures

seg-source.mrk: Qty.
Failures

trans-unit.source: Displays the number of failures that have been processed for the order line (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Failures.htm#_Ref280771265" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Failures” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Displays the number of failures that have been processed for the order line (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Failures.htm#_Ref280771265" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Failures” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Next Price Update Date

seg-source.mrk: Next Price Update Date

trans-unit.source: Date the next price update can be run on the line (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Update Rental Contract Prices.htm#_Ref238975648" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Update Rental Contract Prices” on page 1</MadCap:xref>). Display this field with the “Choose Columns” function.

seg-source.mrk: Date the next price update can be run on the line (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Update Rental Contract Prices.htm#_Ref238975648" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Update Rental Contract Prices” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).
Display this field with the “Choose Columns” function.

trans-unit.source: Price Update Period

seg-source.mrk: Price Update Period

trans-unit.source: Date calculation formula that drives the Next Price Update Date field (refer to topic “Update Rental Contract Prices” on page 1). Display this field with the “Choose Columns” function.

seg-source.mrk: Date calculation formula that drives the Next Price Update Date field (refer to topic “Update Rental Contract Prices” on page 1).
Display this field with the “Choose Columns” function.

trans-unit.source: Last Price Update Date

seg-source.mrk: Last Price Update Date

trans-unit.source: Date the price update was last run for the line (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Update Rental Contract Prices.htm#_Ref238975648" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Update Rental Contract Prices” on page 1</MadCap:xref>). Display this field with the “Choose Columns” function.

seg-source.mrk: Date the price update was last run for the line (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Update Rental Contract Prices.htm#_Ref238975648" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Update Rental Contract Prices” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).
Display this field with the “Choose Columns” function.

trans-unit.source: Last Price Update %

seg-source.mrk: Last Price Update %

trans-unit.source: Percentage of the last price update run for the line (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Update Rental Contract Prices.htm#_Ref238975648" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Update Rental Contract Prices” on page 1</MadCap:xref>). Display this field with the “Choose Columns” function.

seg-source.mrk: Percentage of the last price update run for the line (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Update Rental Contract Prices.htm#_Ref238975648" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Update Rental Contract Prices” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).
Display this field with the “Choose Columns” function.

trans-unit.source: Invoice Multiple

seg-source.mrk: Invoice Multiple

trans-unit.source: If selected, invoices a portion of the complete rental period without using a fixed invoicing period; used with Invoice Period = None.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, invoices a portion of the complete rental period without using a fixed invoicing period; used with Invoice Period = None.

trans-unit.source: Invoice to Date

seg-source.mrk: Invoice to Date

trans-unit.source: Indicates the date to which the next invoice will be created; used with Invoice Period = None.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the date to which the next invoice will be created; used with Invoice Period = None.

trans-unit.source: Total No. of Rate Units

seg-source.mrk: Total No.
of Rate Units

trans-unit.source: Indicates the total rental time calculation and the quantity of rate units as determined by the Rental Start Date and Rental End Date.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the total rental time calculation and the quantity of rate units as determined by the Rental Start Date and Rental End Date.

trans-unit.source: With graduated rental pricing, this field determines the valid price level in the sales line for non-cascading scale price when the Minimum Qty. Rate Units field is populated in the Rental Prices table (refer to topics “Rental Rate Prices” on page 1 and “Exercise – Process a Rent Order with Non-Cascaded Scale Price” on page 1).

seg-source.mrk: With graduated rental pricing, this field determines the valid price level in the sales line for non-cascading scale price when the <span class="Bold">Minimum Qty.
Rate Units field is populated in the Rental Prices table (refer to topics “Rental Rate Prices” on page 1 and “Exercise – Process a Rent Order with Non-Cascaded Scale Price” on page 1).

trans-unit.source: With Lump Sum Invoicing, this field can be changed manually or recalculated by a change to the Unit Price Total Rental Time and Amount Total Rental Time fields (refer to topic “Lump Sum Invoicing” on page 1).

seg-source.mrk: With Lump Sum Invoicing, this field can be changed manually or recalculated by a change to the Unit Price Total Rental Time and Amount Total Rental Time fields (refer to topic “Lump Sum Invoicing” on page 1).

trans-unit.source: Display this field with the “Choose Columns” function.

seg-source.mrk: Display this field with the “Choose Columns” function.

trans-unit.source: Cascaded Price

seg-source.mrk: Cascaded Price

trans-unit.source: Indicates if the sales line is using a cascading scale price (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Exercise Cascaded Scale Price.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Exercise – Process a Rent Order with Cascaded Scale Price” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Indicates if the sales line is using a cascading scale price (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Exercise Cascaded Scale Price.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Exercise – Process a Rent Order with Cascaded Scale Price” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Display this field with the “Choose Columns” function.

seg-source.mrk: Display this field with the “Choose Columns” function.

trans-unit.source: Include Counters

seg-source.mrk: Include Counters

trans-unit.source: If selected, activates the counter-based invoicing for this rental line.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, activates the counter-based invoicing for this rental line.

trans-unit.source: In addition to the rate based invoicing, the system will determine whether a contingent of hours or miles (which are included in the Rate Price) is exhausted or not and create an extra line on the invoice for the difference in usage (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Counter-Based Invoicing.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Counter-Based Invoicing” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: In addition to the rate based invoicing, the system will determine whether a contingent of hours or miles (which are included in the Rate Price) is exhausted or not and create an extra line on the invoice for the difference in usage (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Counter-Based Invoicing.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Counter-Based Invoicing” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Display this field with the “Choose Columns” function.

seg-source.mrk: Display this field with the “Choose Columns” function.

trans-unit.source: Machine No.

seg-source.mrk: Machine No.

trans-unit.source: Automatically populates the Item No. field on the rental contract line and the Serial No. in Item Tracking Lines with the corresponding numbers of the selected Machine. The Quantity is also automatically set to 1, which is required when using this field.

seg-source.mrk: Automatically populates the Item No.
field on the rental contract line and the Serial No.
in Item Tracking Lines with the corresponding numbers of the selected Machine.
The Quantity is also automatically set to 1, which is required when using this field.

trans-unit.source: Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Machines.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Machines” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information about setting up and working with Machines.

seg-source.mrk: Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Machines.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Machines” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information about setting up and working with Machines.

trans-unit.source: Rental Shipment Time

seg-source.mrk: Rental Shipment Time

trans-unit.source: Used with hour-based invoicing to indicate the time that the shipment is posted (starting time of rental). If this time is before the Start Time Working Day defined in the Rental Mgt. Setup, the calculation starts with the Start Time Working Day.

seg-source.mrk: Used with hour-based invoicing to indicate the time that the shipment is posted (starting time of rental).
If this time is before the Start Time Working Day defined in the Rental Mgt.
Setup, the calculation starts with the Start Time Working Day.

trans-unit.source: Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Hour-Based Invoicing.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Hour-Based Invoicing” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information about hour-based invoicing.

seg-source.mrk: Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Hour-Based Invoicing.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Hour-Based Invoicing” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information about hour-based invoicing.

trans-unit.source: Rental Return Time

seg-source.mrk: Rental Return Time

trans-unit.source: Used with hour-based invoicing to indicate the time that the return is posted (ending time of rental). If this time is past the End Time Working Day defined in the Rental Mgt. Setup, the calculation ends at the End Time Working Day.

seg-source.mrk: Used with hour-based invoicing to indicate the time that the return is posted (ending time of rental).
If this time is past the End Time Working Day defined in the Rental Mgt.
Setup, the calculation ends at the End Time Working Day.

trans-unit.source: Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Hour-Based Invoicing.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Hour-Based Invoicing” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information about hour-based invoicing.

seg-source.mrk: Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Hour-Based Invoicing.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Hour-Based Invoicing” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information about hour-based invoicing.

trans-unit.source: Rental FastTab

seg-source.mrk: Rental FastTab

trans-unit.source: As with other information entered at the header level, the information entered in the fields on the Rental FastTab (except the Closed check box) will default to the lines, making data entry simpler when entering multiple rental lines. The Closed check box is automatically selected when the rent order has been fully received and invoiced; it cannot be edited. The fields on this FastTab have no effect on sales positions.

seg-source.mrk: As with other information entered at the header level, the information entered in the fields on the Rental FastTab (except the Closed check box) will default to the lines, making data entry simpler when entering multiple rental lines.
The Closed check box is automatically selected when the rent order has been fully received and invoiced; it cannot be edited.
The fields on this FastTab have no effect on sales positions.

trans-unit.source: : Rent Order page, Rental FastTab
